text: Final results of the Tennis competition at the 1924 Summer Olympics in Paris, France. After the 1924 Olympics, the tennis competition would be dropped until 1988. The mixed doubles competition did not return until the 2012 Olympics. ==Schedule== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !Date !colspan=2|13 July !colspan=2|14 July !colspan=2|15 July !16
